(She must have secretly learned the size of my head just so she could grow mammaries perfectly sized to smother me with!)
(To give herself such a motherly figure, does she think I have a twisted Oedipus complex? Or worse, does she want to give me one?)
(Those giant breasts! Just how attached to her nursing fetish is that woman? To think I would play along, how absurd!)
What an absurdly gargantuan pair of mammaries. Are you a human, or a dairy cow?
I appreciate you fattening yourself up, but all the nutrition is in the wrong places.
There is far too much fat in your chest, woman. I prefer my meat lean, thank you very much.
A single sweep with my dear Gungnir would have turned your adorable little display to ashes. However...
Had I really been frustrated, it would have taken me no more than a single swing of Gungnir to disperse your petty little garden. However...

state.text: After you've seen it once, I can hardly imagine there are any more surprises you could pull out of-

case.state: You would be surprised to learn just how many renowned vampires you're related to.
Where have I heard the name "Nirvana" before... Was it not from that Buddhist woman..?

state.text: I was beginning to like that nickname for you, though. However, if you insist, I suppose I can call you Shimakaze.

case.state: She is Kogasa Tatara, Milady. An umbrella youkai.

state.text: You are still capable of standing? For an inebriated fool, your perseverance is quite admirable.
Hooh. To be so ashamed of your own nudity...
Your squirmy embarrassment is quite humorous to observe, human.
I can smell the blood rushing to your face, human. Are you embarrassed?

case.state: And with that, you'll be laying it all bare, hardly a moment after I've been beaten.
You fought tooth and nail to beat me, and this is all you have to show for it?
Y-you're going to be naked after this round, aren't you?
There's only one thing left to remove, isn't there!?
And now for the grand finale.
To already be at wits' end...
Now there is nothing to stand between you and failure.
Are you not tired of losing yet?
You'll stop losing soon enough. Not because you start winning, mind you, but because you're out of clothes to remove.
Such a poor display! If you told me you were playing to lose, you would have me convinced!
Haah. You've lost everything already?
You had me entertained for a while, but...
I must say - I'm quite disappointed in you.
I think you've burned out a little too soon.
Well, yes, I was entertained by your antics at some point...
Perhaps you've put in a little too much effort into pleasing me?
Ah, yes, another lowborn pushed to the brink.
You are down to nothing after this, no?
It appears you will be but one loss away from defeat.
A member of the lower class, falling before a noble?
Just like that, it appears you have played into the hands of fate.
(A-and now, she'll lay it all bare in front of me!)
(Now, I will bear witness to... her vagina!)
And this would be the main event, I presume?
This is the start of the real show, is it not?
Here's where everybody gets what they really want, isn't it?
Finally, the main event begins!

state.text: If it's a fight you're interested in, plant princess, I am more than happy to oblige.
An impressive build up of energy, plant princess! I wasn't expecting a fight today, but I will not shy away from a battle!
It would be cruel of me to ruin a child's fun like that, so I had refrained. Don't let my generosity go to waste.
I have no interest in picking on poor little whelps and their childish games. Do not waste this chance I have given you.
Y-you. Did you just..? My word, what a perverted deviant you are, to get excited from something like that...

case.state: For all you know, I could even be your half-aunt! (Or something like that...)
To give your ship the name of a paradise, one that can only be obtained by overcoming fate... how poetic.

state.text: What, did you take me for a fool? I knew how to say your name from the very start, tsukumogami.

case.state: And a bit of an idiot, it looks like.
I have observed your fate, human. Show me that 'hope' you have so much pride in.
Now then, human destined to overcome despair. Show me what you are capable of!

state.text: Gensokyo's drunken revelries tend towards nudity as well. What is it with drunkards and throwing away all their clothing?
It is that lack of pride which will prevent you from becoming anything more than a lowborn plebeian.
How very human, to be utterly incapable of having pride in one's own form!
I, too, would be ashamed of myself if I were a lowly human.

case.state: (Damn! If only I had held out for just a little longer...)
(It was only a game of chance, but losing to these fools? How vexing.)
T-that wasn't a tone of enjoyment! You must've misheard me-!
J-joy? From me? Y-you must be mistaken!
You have one last chance to stage a comeback. Do impress me, please.
They say that a cornered rat will bite the cat, but does that hold true for insects too?
It is time to show me the tenacity of the lower class.
Please, do hang in there. I wish this game to be a fight, not a stomp.
I think you should give up on winning the game at this point.
And now, you are one step away from total defeat.
It appears you have nothing left to lose - quite literally, in fact.
You've simply overdone it. I enjoy savouring my meals, after all.
I suppose I was in the wrong to expect a lowborn to hold out for this long.
Whatever your plan was, you have failed. I tire of your antics.
My interest in you has waned. Too bad.
One can only watch the same song and dance for so long.
Yawn. Do not expect the same petty tricks to entertain me for so long.
I would love to act surprised, but the mechanisms of fate tend to be quite predictable.
What a surprise.
The world's script tends to be unoriginal, but I enjoy its whims nonetheless.
Now, with your back against the wall, how will you fight against this fate of yours?
(T-to perform this exotic mating ritual in an effort to seduce me, what incredible depravity!)
(T-these damned lesbians, corrupting me with their private parts! I-I won't be swayed!)
(She's not even hiding her lust towards me anymore! S-such eagerness to strip off!)
Eh? Not just yet, then? Well, I suppose I can wait for a little longer.
It seems that this is just the prelude? Well, I suppose all in good time.
Just a teaser, then? I can't wait.
Have you not heard of grooming, human? Show some dignity, please.
Some degenerates think there is some charm in being unshaven, but I am glad at least some of you have a sense of decency.
My word, what is with this towering being? Is she even human?
Well then? Go on. Put on a show for us.
How long will you be keeping up this ruse, Miss Alice?
You've run out of time, Miss Alice. There would be no better time than now to finally rid yourself of that awful human guise.
This human bears quite an interesting secret, one that they would rather take to the grave than let become exposed.
Well then, human? What shall you do now? It won't be long before your secret is revealed.
I still do not understand what that floating being is, but it seems that the original human has returned.
A bakeneko? And a feral one too, judging from her lack of clothing.
Fool, fool, fool. Foolish fool. Is that the only insult you know how to use?
Lady Remilia, while he may appear as an ordinary, uncouth young male, he holds quite a surprising power.
You, the clown. You are a human, yes? Absolutely not from the moon, correct?
Eugh. Such bitter, black blood. Even the tapestry of fate is screaming to me, that I should have nothing to do with this man.
Such a bright and flamboyant fairy. Fairies are already irritating enough to be around, but this one hurts to look at.
I am quite interested in seeing what a holy woman from the west is capable of.
Has the time come to stop playing nice already, holy woman? If you wish to throw away your life, I am more than happy to assist.
Mei-ling? Is that what this human's name is? How interesting it is that you share a name with our gatekeeper.
Milady, I would highly recommend you proceed with caution. I wouldn't trust that woman for a second.
Sakuya. What is this disgusting waste of space doing here? Remove it from my sight. Immediately.
Honestly. Must I really deal with such a short-tempered, foul-mouthed little girl?
What the-! You, the blue fairy, what are you doing!? To be slacking off in front of her master, such audacity!
An oracle of time, is it? A creature whose powers have yet to be seen in the land of Gensokyo...
From her rebellious attitude to even the way she styles her hair, Miss Ryuko is a splitting image of that Seija Kijin girl.
Something tells me what is about to happen will be quite interesting. Well then, please, be my guest.
What in the world... This girl, her fate is..!
You may have masked the smell of rot from the noses of a human, but you cannot fool a vampire so easily.
Is it time for you to show your true colours, miss living corpse?
The inevitability of fate can truly be a sight to behold. Indeed, there is a fine example right before my very eyes!
Simultaneously human and not human, what a bizarre creature. Are you some kind of youkai?
Milady, if you do little else today, I implore you. Do not do anything that would capture this woman's attention.
You've already told us you're a monstergirl. Why must you continue to take such a pitiful form?
You are correct that it is uncommon for a human woman to be so tall, but she is definitely human, Milady.
If all you are capable of doing is a simple costume change, then you will struggle to hold my attention for long.
It pains me to see you in such a sorry state. How desperate must you be to take up the form of a pitiful human?
Finally! I am quite glad that you have finally given up on maintaining that pathetic human form, Miss Alice...

state.text: Or perhaps I should call you by your true name, O Lord of Monsters, Alipheese Fateburn XVI? I am quite delighted to make your aquaintance.

case.state: Have they not realised what kind of game this is? Human truly are stupid creatures.
As expected, the option you take is to run away and escape from your fate! But it won't be long before destiny catches up to yo-
And now, for the moment of truth where everything is revealed! Now then, what sort of face will you show us?
There is absolutely no reason for you not to be wearing any clothes. If Satori's pet can do it, then so can you.
Allow the great Remilia Scarlet to teach you a lesson on vocabulary. Be thankful, now, girl.
No need to explain, Sakuya. But still, it is indeed surprising to see a human capable of precognition, regardless of how limited it is.
The denizens of Gensokyo speak of a tyrannical monster hailing from the moon...
Sakuya. Remove this eyesore from my sight.
Lust may indeed be a force of nature, but must we really have a fairy of all things to become its embodiment?
My run-ins with your comrades have been... disappointing, to say the least.
Cancelling your magic already? Have you realised the futility of your actions?
What you do not share with her, however, is your physique.
Hmph. Do you take me for a fool, Sakuya? I can see right through that guise of hers.
I... I apologise, Milady, but there are things even I am not capable of...
I am of the same mind, Milady.
Milady, this fairy is not under our employ.
Although, I suppose that is incorrect, since you exist, wouldn't you say... Sakuya?
That amanojaku girl? Ah, the one that tried to invite you to a resistance force. "You cannot understand the oppression of the weak", she said.
Humans are truly disgusting creatures. Absolutely despicable, utterly shameless, barbaric, revolting beings!
Although, I wish you had. Eugh.
On one hand, I'm surprised your disguise has worked up until this point.
Make up your mind, corpse girl. Are you a zombie, or are you a dullahan?
You may struggle and fight all you want to overturn your destiny, but it is meaningless. Your ending has been set in stone.
Wait a moment, are you taking your undergarments off first? Is this a challenge of sorts?
Again with your undergarments first? You are quite adamant on this strategy of yours. Is this behaviour normal for those of your kind?
If you say that with such a grim expression, I suppose I'll humour you. However, what makes you say that, Sakuya?
Are gloves not part of a servant's uniform, Sakuya?
...I, for some unfathomable reason, must request that you do not remove your hat. I simply cannot comprehend why, though...
There is a common myth in Gensokyo that ribbons are quite extraordinary, and serve to contain an unimaginable power.
That a human, and a woman, no less, would have a height comparable to an oni... I am somewhat impressed.
Perhaps it was wrong of me to place high expectations on a whelp such as you? Only time shall tell, I suppose.
Come now, there is no need to delude these fools any longer. You should reveal your true form to us all.
Now then, how will you go about this game? Kufufu, I am expecting an amusing conclusion to this all... Don't disappoint me.
..? Eh? What... a shikigami? An apparition? Some kind of poltergeist? What a bizarre turn of events...
...Somehow, I was expecting something a little more... exciting. Maybe it was wrong for me to get my hopes up about a human...
Although, perhaps there is a more insidious reason for her to be in this state. I wonder.
You blockheaded buffoon. You imbecilic idiot. You mindless moron. If you're going to insult people so freely, at least use some variety.
I wonder how he would react to me unleashing the full extent of my power... kuhuhu, how amusing, how amusing indeed!
But I must be mistaken. You seem to be utterly harmless. Carry on, then, human.
Milady, I... I cannot comply. He's not an opponent to be taken lightly... that, and I also do not wish to come into contact with... it.
Better than some disgusting succubus, I suppose.
Only humans are idiotic enough to think that they could kill me with naught but sharpened sticks and common garden vegetables.
You are three hundred years too early to try and defeat me, girl. Honestly, I've seen fairies more threatening than you.
I much prefer my meat to be lean, thank you very much.
The face of a human, with the heart of a demon. She is not one to be taken lightly.
...What a frightening creature we must deal with today...
I certainly hope you are referring to that schoolgirl and not anyone else, Sakuya.
Eh, is that so? I-I mean, I was just testing you, Sakuya. To see if you could differentiate the fairies under our employ.
...I would be lying if I said I was not interested in having a conversation with this woman, Milady.
Kuhuhu. If she had the time to babble about her weakness, she should have spent that time to become strong instead. What a foolish youkai.
Ohoho. Such an impressive surge in vitality... More than my interest, what you've really roused is my appetite.
Tonight, a blood moon will descend upon this land once again, and the earth shall be stained crimson...
The only corpses I wish to have in my presence are those I have freshly drained. Fresh being the key word.
On the other hand, even the most idiotic of fairies can lead a human by the nose with ease, so I suppose it's not a surprise at all.
Pull yourself together so that we can continue the game already.
I wish you the best of luck in this game, girl. After all, your life hangs in the balance... Kuhuhu...
If you're trying to provoke me with your actions, allow me to warn you that it is very much not working.
No, it seems I was wrong. It appears that you're just a degenerate exhibitionist. Wonderful.
It... is better if you do not know, Milady. It is for your own good.
Sakuya, what sort of savage beast are you portraying me as? Would you cut down the dog that barks at you in fear? Of course not.
I rend through flashy armor just as easily as hidden pieces. What difference does it make?
Not at all, Milady. It may be surprising, but the endurance of a head maid is not something to be taken lightly.
...it is equally true that misplaced confidence will lead one to an early demise. Under which case do you fall, I wonder..?
Kukuku... let us see how long it takes for your true form to make an appearance.
Hmm... Normally, humans fail to wear anything remotely suitable for one such as I, but in this case... maybe so. I will think about it.
Milady, please show some self restraint. It would be a problem if we were to impose on this venue like that.
A very, very long time, Milady. It is rare that the border weakens enough to let us leave, and rarer still that Lady Yukari would help us go through.
Gensokyo is a world connected, but separate, to this one. It contains everything that has been lost or forgotten by humanity.
Generally not, Milady. We put on gloves when cleaning or gardening, but they are certainly not part of our normal uniform.
It is not just you, Milady. This is quite... unsettling to see, to say the least.
Please try to hide your desires to play with my hair, Sakuya. Such a lack of restraint is ill-befitting of you.
No, Milady, it really is uncommon for humans to develop magical powers like this...
They also say that where there is smoke, there is fire. Perhaps there is some truth to that claim after all... kuhuhu.
You are correct, Milady. It appears Yukari has sent us to Earth.
I will have an itinerary prepared by the end of the game, Milady.
They seem have a suitable temperament, so it would be a trivial matter to teach them servitude. And it goes without saying that they would undoubtedly be better than the common fairy maids.
I would say I am an appropriate height for a woman of my age. I am sure being tall carries with it just as many problems as being short does.
Ah! But surely you've heard about my ancestor? I do believe he is quite a legendary figure in the human world.
Then again, there is merit to a peaceful life too. At the very least, I don't have to worry about any pesky vampire hunters - well, not anymore, any way.
Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes when your food is being prepared?
Do you humans not do the same things, what with those 'zoo' places you have?
Are humans so dimwitted nowadays that they think pointing out the obvious passes for an insult?
Me? A dirty succubus? Such absurdity! I almost cut him down where he stood!
Milady, please do not do that.
Honestly! If it weren't for the fact that she's holding all of Gensokyo together, I would have wiped that stupid smirk off of her face already.
And with that, it appears your fate is sealed.
Oh, you've lost too? How kind of you to join me...
Have you not had enough of losing yet?
How many times do you want to lose in a single game?
I may have asked you to dance for my entertainment, but I do think you've overdone it.
So ends your losing spree. What now?
Too bad that was the last loss you could add to your collection.
It's only natural for the riff-raff to lay down before nobility.
What a shame. It seems you could not overcome your fate.
How very human, to try and fight fate but ultimately fail.
You have done well to make it this far, but you were foolish to think you could best a vampire.
You put in quite the effort to get this far, but stumbled right at the end.
It's not easy to beat destiny - and you are living proof of that fact.
H-how kind of you to join me..!
C-challenging me again? How bold..!
You wish to engage me in a challenge of endurance? So b-be it!
I may have lost in a game of luck, but this is now a game of skill! You won't beat me that easihic-!
And so, another one bites the dust.
My, my. I suppose now is when the real performance begins.
The game may now be over for you, but your display begins here.
(Curse that damned fate of my own! Just a single round longer would have sufficed!)
Don't misunderstand me, peasant. Y-you don't excite me in the slightest.
Well, you can't lose anymore than this. Enjoy. You pervert.
Geh. Were you some kind of deviant who enjoys being humiliated all this time?
I hope you're not a perverse creep that likes to be watched doing such... things.
Y-you're misguided if you think I'd enjoy a distasteful sight such as this.
Do you take me to be some kind of deviant who would enjoy this?
I have had humans prostrate themselves before me, but few for this reason.
Now then, perhaps you can entertain me with this one last dance?
You may have lost, but the game is not over just yet.
You can't stop here, though. The show must go on!
This may be the end of your game, but that just means it's the beginning of your performance.
(This pervert! Unsatisfied with just observing, he threw the game in order to vent out the pent up sexual frustrations he got from watching me!)
(Losing on purpose, just to masturbate alongside me? I knew this disgusting male had a mutual masturbation fetish!)
(A-all this time, this game was a farce to trick me into conducting sexual activities alongside others! You devious fiends!)
(Throwing the game just so he could masturbate at the same time! Does he want to seem 'relatable', so that I would fall for him? The fool!)
I hope you can put on a good show for us.
Do your best, peasant. I may not, but I'm sure the others have high hopes for you.
I am excited to see what one who has beaten me can really do, ufufu.
T-to have to commit these acts alongside these filthy commoners...
To think I would be reduced to such a sorry state...
D-don't let my appearance fool you. I'm not e-enjoying this at all..!
You think that I am enjoying this? You're s-sorely mistaken..!
Nonsense, I-I'm not embarrassed by this at all.
To be so calm about this... Well, perhaps calm isn't quite right.
To proceed with such vigour after losing... how perplexing.
You are far too excited about this. Isn't that action supposed to be the punishment for losing?
To think that losing would be considered enjoyable. What a poorly constructed game.
Usually, I prefer for fools to be writhing in pain when they are on the floor in front of me, but I suppose this isn't too dissatisfying...
It is good to see you know your place as a filthy animal, and are finally embracing that nature of yours.
How utterly shameless, to do such a thing in front of complete strangers...
Will you be finishing soon? I do not want to waste all my time in the human world watching a dog in heat.
It is... a little bit perplexing for my victims to have their faces dyed with pleasure and not despair...
A glass in hand and a serf labouring away in front of me? Just another night, I suppose.
Is it not the victor's privilege to gloat over the losers?
With your heart pumping and blood boiling... it's becoming quite difficult to resist the urge to bite.
Ahh, how wonderful! Truly, to the victors go the spoils!
The only thing that would make this sight better would be the comfort of my own throne.
... Perhaps I should teach the fairy maids how to play this game too...
I would have preferred my spoils to be in the form of blood, but I suppose entertainment is fine too.
This is not the usual way I humiliate my foes after a fight, but perhaps I should add it to my repertoire.
This pig is far too eager to accept their punishment for losing. I would expect nothing less from perverted scum.
Continue with that dance of yours, you filthy degenerate. Be thankful that I will watch your performance to the end.
Face it - you were waiting for this moment, weren't you? To writhe in pleasure before one such as myself. How disgusting.
If I still had my drink, this would be a perfect night.
(Look at him, undressing me with his ey- wait a second.)
(That perverted look! I can tell, he's imagining what it'd be like to push me down and ravage me right here... barbarian!)
(He-he's imagining the pure and innocent me doing all sorts of h-horrible, dirty deeds!)
(T-that bastard, using my purity to fuel his passionate desires! Pervert! Deviant! Idiot!)
(I can tell that depraved soul has already ravished me in his mind numerous times now!)
(Those eyes are drowning in madness... it won't be much longer before he pounces on me, that animal!)
(He's still going... I know he is in pursuit of my body, but I won't yield!)
(T-they may dominate my body, but they won't break my mind..!)
Heeh, are you enjoying this?
Are you enjoying being watched? My, my, what a perverse fellow!
Does it feel good, grovelling before me?
Mesmerised, are you? I'm unsurprised.
The way your face warps in pleasure is quite amusing to me, kukuku.
My, my. What a loose individual you are, to be so engrossed in this.
Is your face red because it is dyed with shame, or because it is filled with pleasure? Knowing trash like you, it's probably both.
It's astounding that you have such vigour this late into the game. Well, I suppose this is the moment you've been waiting for, kuhuhu.
I've hardly even started, and you've already managed to finish? Please, I may have lost, but I still desire a challenge.
Come now, you're done already? I was looking forward to experiencing the tenacity of the commonfolk...
T-to spray that filth all over! Have you no shame?
Oh, are you done already? I was enjoying that.
That's it? You couldn't hold out for any longer?
Well, expecting any level of endurance was wishful thinking to begin with.
What, was the excitement too much for you?
Bah, was that it? Surely you can do better than that.
A-aha! I... I held out! Ahahahic-!
N-not today! I won't yield to a-any of you tod- hic-!
It's entirely natural for a hic-! T-to... to..!
I-I made it! I knew that I would never g-give ihic-!
Bravo, bravo. A fine display, for sure.
And so ends a fine display.
Couldn't quite hold out, could you? A shame, but such is how it goes.
Finished already? I was hoping you would go for a little longer.

state.text: ...You are, by far, the most pathetic excuse for royalty I have ever witnessed. Have you no shame, so-called Saint?
By the looks of it, you have nothing left to shoot off.
I hope you don't have any more tricks up your sleeve, princess, or I really will need to-
Is this it? Is this really it? Have you learned to give up, princess-

case.state: Oh, was that your final round, then, Meia? What a shame you couldn't hold out for longer.

state.text: W-what the-!

case.state: And with that, it appears your fate is sealed.
Oh, you've lost too? How kind of you to join me...
Have you not had enough of losing yet?
How many times do you want to lose in a single game?

And so, another one bites the dust.
My, my. I suppose now is when the real performance begins.
The game may now be over for you, but your display begins here.

state.text: ...I'm almost disappointed. Perhaps I had gotten accustomed to your antics.
... This certainly was not what I was expecting. How amusing!
... How... interesting! That you would use your plants in such an... exotic... way.

case.state: I wanted to hear more of your stories, but I suppose we'll have to end them here.

state.text: To think that once she ran out of clothes, her body would explode instead! What a wonderful finale!
I-is she just going to run away? What an absurd little creature.

case.state: (Curse that damned fate of my own! Just a single round longer would have sufficed!)
Don't misunderstand me, peasant. Y-you don't excite me in the slightest.
Well, you can't lose anymore than this. Enjoy. You pervert.

(A-all this time, this game was a farce to trick me into conducting sexual activities alongside others! You devious fiends!)
(Throwing the game just so she could masturbate at the same time! Does she want to seem 'relatable', so that I would fall for her? The fool!)
I hope you can put on a good show for us.

I am excited to see what one who has beaten me can really do, ufufu.
Sakuya left me a ch-- oh. I see you're all still going at it.
Sakuya left me a ch-- you're all so busy. Did anyone even notice me leaving?
I was expecting a show, Sakuya, and this is certainly not what I was expecting.

state.text: Hello, Miss Virtuous Ewe Tuber? Have you lost your mind or something? Will you do anything more than just stand there?
I expected to be entertained, oh Virtuous one, and I am anything but right now.
I have been standing here this entire game, waiting for you to do something interesting, and yet I have seen nothing of the sort.

case.state: What are these nonsensical utterances? Has she lost her wits? The frailty of the human mind truly is a sight to behold.
(The room is ripe with the stench of bitches!)
T-to have to commit these acts alongside these filthy commoners...
To think I would be reduced to such a sorry state...
D-don't let my appearance fool you. I'm not e-enjoying this at all..!
You think that I am enjoying this? You're s-sorely mistaken..!
Nonsense, I-I'm not embarrassed by this at all.
To be so calm about this... Well, perhaps calm isn't quite right.
To proceed with such vigour after losing... how perplexing.
You are far too excited about this. Isn't that action supposed to be the punishment for losing?
To think that losing would be considered enjoyable. What a poorly constructed game.
Usually, I prefer for fools to be writhing in pain when they are on the floor in front of me, but I suppose this isn't too dissatisfying...
It is good to see you know your place as a filthy animal, and are finally embracing that nature of yours.
How utterly shameless, to do such a thing in front of complete strangers...
Will you be finishing soon? I do not want to waste all my time in the human world watching a dog in heat.
It is... a little bit perplexing for my victims to have their faces dyed with pleasure and not despair...
A glass in hand and a serf labouring away in front of me? Just another night, I suppose.
Is it not the victor's privilege to gloat over the losers?
With your heart pumping and blood boiling... it's becoming quite difficult to resist the urge to bite.
Ahh, how wonderful! Truly, to the victors go the spoils!
The only thing that would make this sight better would be the comfort of my own throne.
... Perhaps I should teach the fairy maids how to play this game too...
I would have preferred my spoils to be in the form of blood, but I suppose entertainment is fine too.
This is not the usual way I humiliate my foes after a fight, but perhaps I should add it to my repertoire.
This sow is far too eager to accept their punishment for losing. I would expect nothing less from perverted scum.
Continue with that dance of yours, you filthy degenerate. Be thankful that I will watch your performance to the end.
Face it - you were waiting for this moment, weren't you? To writhe in pleasure before one such as myself. How disgusting.
If I still had my drink, this would be a perfect night.
(Look at her, undressing me with her eyes- wait a second.)
(That perverted look! I can tell, she's imagining what it'd be like to push me down and ravage me right here... barbarian!)
(She-she's imagining the pure and innocent me doing all sorts of h-horrible, dirty deeds!)
(T-that bastard, using my purity to fuel her passionate desires! Pervert! Deviant! Idiot!)
(I can tell that depraved soul has already ravished me in her mind numerous times now!)
(Those eyes are drowning in madness... it won't be much longer before she pounces on me, that animal!)
(She's still going... I know she is in pursuit of my body, but I won't yield!)
(T-they may dominate my body, but they won't break my mind..!)
Heeh, are you enjoying this?
Are you enjoying being watched? My, my, what a perverse fellow!
Does it feel good, grovelling before me?
Mesmerised, are you? I'm unsurprised.
The way your face warps in pleasure is quite amusing to me, kukuku.
My, my. What a loose individual you are, to be so engrossed in this.
Is your face red because it is dyed with shame, or because it is filled with pleasure? Knowing trash like you, it's probably both.
It's astounding that you have such vigour this late into the game. Well, I suppose this is the moment you've been waiting for, kuhuhu.
Oh, my. That pattern wasn't bad at all. My evaluation of you has risen ever so slightly, young fledgeling.

state.text: Puh-! Kh, fu, a-are you alright there, little princess? That was quite a show you put on, there!
Wha-! Ah, pfft, oh, little miss plant princess! I had my reservations about you, but that was a sublime ending!
My word! I have seen some bizarre things in Gensokyo before, but that was something of an entirely different calibre!
W-what in the world was that!? Did I see that right?
Never in my many centuries have I seen such an oddity before. I truly am quite perplexed!
Well, I suppose I was somewhat entertained towards the end there, but, I don't suppose you could hurry it all up next time?
You had definitely captured my attention towards the end there, but, could I ask you to do your whole routine for a little longer?
Oh! One more for the grand finale, it seems.
Pfft, you even managed to shoot yourself at the end of all that? What happened to all that bragging you were doing?

case.state: I've hardly even started, and you've already managed to finish? Please, I may have lost, but I still desire a challenge.
Come now, you're done already? I was looking forward to experiencing the tenacity of the commonfolk...
It's not quite kneeling at my feet, but it'll have to do, I suppose.
Oh? Is that all? You couldn't hold out for any longer than that?
It's only natural that a loser would have equally poor stamina.
...Perhaps I should have Sakuya clean this place up a little after that display...
Oh, are you done already? I was enjoying that.
That's it? You couldn't hold out for any longer?
Well, expecting any level of endurance was wishful thinking to begin with.
What, was the excitement too much for you?
Bah, was that it? Surely you can do better than that.
A-aha! I... I held out! Ahahahic-!
N-not today! I won't yield to a-any of you tod- hic-!
It's entirely natural for a hic-! T-to... to... hic-!
I-I made it! I knew that I would never g-give ihic-!
Bravo, bravo. A fine display, for sure.
And so ends a fine display.
Couldn't quite hold out, could you? A shame, but such is how it goes.
Finished already? I was hoping you would go for a little longer.
Ufufu, it seems that none here could surpass fa- Eh?
Another loss to add to your rec- Eh?
You were all fools to believe you could best m- Eh?
Kuh- kyahaha! Who could have imagined that the great Scarlet Devil would have been the first to fa-
To think, not only have I lost to all of you, I have lost before all you peas-
Ufufu, it seems that none here could surpass fa- Eh?
Another loss to add to your rec- Eh?
You were all fools to believe you could best m- Eh?
Kuhuhu-! I've lost? Against all of you? Truly, it appears a miracle has occurred on this da-
To steal away a victory from the great Remilia Scarlet! You must all be so very pleased with your sel-
-hic! U-urgh. P-Perhaps I may have been drinking too much...
-hic! O-oh, Sakuya was right about moderation, wasn't she...
I-I am not drunk at all. What would give you that impre- Hic!
Damn that maid of mine, running away at the worst of times...
What, did you expect me to sit on the floor? That dirty place? Do you think nothing of my pride?
I-I am a noble! No matter how embarrassed I am, I will not run away from my loss.
I may need to abandon my dignity, but I cannot throw away my pride.
I suppose it's for the best that I've been drinking, if I'm going to have to do this.
I-I would be much more hesitant about this if I hadn't been drinking.
B-be glad that I am not shrouding myself in mist.
(I didn't expect to lose this game at all...)
U-urgh. I-I'm getting a little dizzy... perhaps I have drank too much for one day...
I hate to say it, but Sakuya was right about drinking too much...
As much as I abhor the thought of performing like this, such are the rules of the game.
I would not normally be so brazen. Perhaps I have been drinking too much.
I've lived for five hundred years now, hic. O-Of course I know what masturbation is.
Yes, I know what masturbation is. What do you take me for, a ch- hic!
M-me, enjoying myself? No, I'm no- hic!
Is this what p-passes for fun nowadays?
I can't believe I am enjoying this...
This will be over soon, for better or for worse.
I won't lose to the likes of you...
Guh-!
Mmph-!
C-come on then!
Tch. To think I would end up losing before that utter buffoon who calls herself a saint...
...Sakuya took all my clothing, didn't she...
I'd much rather die than ask Yukari to send me back home while in this state.
I still can't believe I lost. I guess my fate manipulation really doesn't work in the human world.
This game has taken quite a lot out of me. I will have to return to the mansion for a nap after this.
This chair is nothing like the furniture at the Mansion, but I suppose I'm not in a position to be picky.
I-I'm not drunk anymo-hic. I'm not that drunk anymore.
You should be glad that I'm quite full now, otherwise I may have done something... unpleasant after the game finished.
Fate is a fickle mistress, and it seems I am yet to fully tame her.
(I certainly hope I didn't voice any of my drunken thoughts aloud.)
For a 'perfect maid', Sakuya sure is taking her time.
Tch. I'm going to have a long chat with my little sister Flan once this game ends.
Now then, it was a pleasure playing with you all, but I must return before my younger sister destroys my home. Again.
The game is already over? Pah. I didn't even get to play. What a waste of time.
You put up some semblance of a resistance, but it simply wasn't enough. Do try harder next time.
I'm not even surprised that this was the outcome of the game. Do try harder next time.
Well. This game wasn't a complete victory for me, but at least I obtained some enjoyment out of it.
This game was a good distraction, but little more than that. I hope you all put up a better fight next time.
You were brave enough to go up against a true vampire. I commend you for your efforts, at the very least.
You were so close, yet so far! How poetic, to fight fate and come out the loser!
Finally. Now then, I must depart, lest that foolish little sister of mine threaten to destroy the world again.
Sakuya left me a ch- huh? T-the game's over? W-well then, good game.
Did you just call me "Remi"? Do not act so familiar, brat.
Winning a game of luck does not grant you the privilege of calling me "Remi", insolent whelp.
Done? Finally. Miko, may I have a word with you?
Now then, Saint, don't say I don't keep my promises.
If you're all done with this game, I suggest leaving. Except you, Miko. We have unfinished business.
Perhaps I will take you up on that offer, goddess. The night is young, after all.
Well, it appears I have been bested. I quite enjoyed my time here - you can expect me to be back.
A win is a win. It's no small feat to reign supreme over a true vampire. I'm pleasantly surprised!
W-woah. A noble such a-as I can't just sit on the f-floor like that... I'm going to find a chair, or a cushion maybe...
W-well, it appears Sakuya left this chair outside for me...
...Surprise? A pleasant surprise?

scene.name: Opening
scene.directive: After the game.

scene.name: Expos 1
scene.directive: The Inventory is a secret usually kept hidden, meaning it's tucked away in an undisclosed location.
Because of that, it takes a bit of a walk to go between the actual building and the nearest roadway.
That also means you have to walk through an eerie forest to return home. On the way back to your car...
(Isn't that that vampire girl, Remilia?)
But before you can even call out to her--

scene.name: Sitting
scene.directive: Just because I'm unclothed, doesn't mean I've let my guard down, whoever you are--
Oh, ~player~, it's just you.
I wouldn't recommend ever sneaking up on me like that.
I was this close to separating your delicious-looking neck from the rest of your body.
You know, ~player~, I haven't eaten a full meal in quite a while, now.
I had been showing some self-restraint while we were in that building, but...
We're not bound by their rules anymore, you know?
I hope you'll forgive me for my forwardness, ~player~, but...
Thanks for the meal.

scene.name: PreLewds
scene.directive: As expected, your blood was absolutely delicious. Ahh, what a treat!
Here I had thought that I had sucked you dry, but it looks like you're still full of energy.
~Player~. Did you know? Vampire saliva is a powerful anaesthetic. Not that I need to explain that to you - you are already experiencing it, no?
There's no need to say anything - not that you can, anyway - I can see it. Your eyes are unfocused, your breathing is weak. You can't feel a thing anymore, can you?
Your whole body, numb, and completely out of your control...
...including this little part right here.
How did I manage to squeeze a full meal out of you when there's still this much blood down here? What a lively young man you are.
... You know, I'm still quite excited, myself. Making me use my own hands, just what kind of peasant do they take me for?
Luckily for me, there's a poor little slave who's entirely willing to devote themselves to me! Ah, isn't fate generous today?
Ah, but, I am a kind master. You may cum whenever you want, my precious little toy. Of course, if you can, ufufu...
Come now, you're losing consciousness already?
Bah, this is why I hate humans. You're all so pathetic.
Hmph. Well, it doesn't matter if he's awake or not, I suppose.
Nghh--!

scene.name: Lewds1
scene.directive: Mmm... Ahh-!
~Player~, y-you've managed to wake up. Quite t-tenacious, aren't you?
So? Isn't this just heavenly?
Ahh, that's right! You still can't feel a thing!
What a wonderful expression you have right now!
Are you frustrated? Does this make you mad?
The satisfaction you seek is so close, yet so far...
But in the end, you're just a pathetic human. Nothing but livestock to a vampire like me.

scene.name: Lewds2
scene.directive: Aah-! I'm getting close...
You're running out o-of time, ~player~.
Can you seize the opportunity in front of you?
Will you find the power to overturn this fate of yours? Will you become more than a lowly human?
Of course not. A pathetic whelp like you has no chance of beating the great Scarlet Devil.
This is the end-!

scene.name: Lewds3
scene.directive: Nnngh!
Ahaha. Don't feel too ashamed, human.
There are very, very few people in this world capable of overturning their fate.
There's no need to act tough anymore. Goodnight, toy.
I'll be seeing you again soon, I'm sure.

scene.name: Conclusion
scene.directive: It's still dark by the time you wake up, but you have no way of knowing just how long you were out for.
You stagger down the path and to your car, somewhat light-headed...
...and still hard as diamonds.
